Saddle pad Head Accessories Face Accessories Tail Accessories Legs Accessories Feet Accessories Shoulder Accessories Mouth Accessories Auras Only one accessory of each type can be worn by a...
data.text:
Accessories are items you can equip to a horse for cosmetic purposes.

Overview[]

There are 9 types of accessories.

Saddle pad

Head Accessories

Face Accessories

Tail Accessories

Legs Accessories

Feet Accessories

Shoulder Accessories

Mouth Accessories

Auras

Only one accessory of each type can be worn by a horse at any given time, for a total of 9 accessories.

Accessories NPCs[]

Abbie : Has an accessory/aura shop

Cal : Identifies Archaeological Deposits that can be an Accessory

Sunny : Gives a Summer Accessory as a reward

Bhurnes : Can give Volcanic coloured accessories in exchange for volcanic minerals

Ghost : Runs both the Autumn and Halloween Event Shops

Pearl (NPC) : Gives a Halloween Accessory As a reward

Larry : Runs all the of the event shops (Previous and current) and runs the main shops that contain Island-Unique Saddle Pads

Henry : Can access the event shop through him

Henry Jr : Gives an Autumn Accessory as a reward

Hank : Gives a Winter Accessory as a reward

Luna :Gives a Spring Accessory as a reward

Noel : Gives a Holiday Accessory as a reward

Cupid : Gives a Valentines Accessory as a reward

Francine: You can Access the event shop through her

Accessories In-Game:[]

Accessories In Main Shop[]

Archaeological Finds/Accessories from Unidentified Relics[]

Jester Hat

Royal Torch

Medieval Shield

Purple Crystal Patterned Accessories

Brown Leather Patterned Accessories

Purple/Gold Damask Patterned Accessories

Hoof Trails (Purple And Yellow)

Confetti Aura

Jousting Lance

Limited textures/Colours:[]

See Textures/Colours page

Limited Accessories : Unicorn Academy x Wild Horse Islands Event[]

The Unicorn Academy x Wild Horse Islands Event Introduced Accessories that could not be bought in an event shop, but had to be obtained through redeeming Unicorn Gems with the respective Unicorn Rider to receive a randomised accessory in any Colour, Material, or Pattern. The Accessories you could receive are as follows...
